TopicTitle: Can someone make a Magic boulder mod? Add it in as a part.

Articles.Content:
Would someone be able to make a mod that adds the magic boulder as a part without too much difficulty? I've been wondering about this possibility for a while.

#Bringbacktheboulder
I know a mod that uses KopernicusTech and implements a small world that you can land on; it's called the Sprinkle mod.
Hm... I really hope this would be easier to do with Unity 5.
